component.name: RotatedRectangleExample
component.script: sub init() examplerect = m.top.boundingRect() examplelrect = m.top.localBoundingRect() centerx = -examplerect.x + (1280 - examplelrect.width) / 2 centery = -examplerect.y + (720 - examplelrect.height) / 2 m.top.translation = [ centerx, centery ] end sub
